app.title: Personality Test
app.basedOn: Based on the IPIP Big Five personality framework

admin.noResultsDescription: No personality tests have been completed yet.
admin.seedHint: Run {command} in the backend to create test data.
admin.dimensionsLegend: E = Extraversion, A = Agreeableness, C = Conscientiousness, ES = Emotional Stability, O = Openness
admin.detailedInterpretation: Detailed interpretation of the personality test
admin.generatingTime: This may take up to a minute
admin.noInterpretationsDescription: This result was created before the AI integration.
admin.disclaimerText: This interpretation is based on the IPIP Big Five model. Personality traits exist on a spectrum and can change over time. This result provides a snapshot, not a fixed definition of the person.

home.title: Discover Your Personality
home.description: Take the IPIP-50 personality assessment, a scientifically validated tool designed to measure your unique traits across five key dimensions.
home.traitsSubtitle: Discover how you score across these five fundamental dimensions of personality, each capturing a unique aspect of who you are.
home.ipipDescription1: The International Personality Item Pool (IPIP) is a public-domain collection of personality assessment items developed by leading researchers in psychology. Our assessment uses the IPIP-50, a validated 50-item scale that measures the Big Five personality traits.
home.ipipDescription2: Unlike proprietary personality tests, IPIP instruments are freely available for research and practical use, ensuring transparency and accessibility in personality science.
home.footer: This assessment is based on the IPIP-50, a public-domain representation of Costa and McCrae's Big Five personality model.

traitDescriptions.extraversion: How outgoing, energetic, and talkative you are in social situations.
traitDescriptions.agreeableness: How cooperative, trusting, and helpful you are towards others.
traitDescriptions.conscientiousness: How organized, reliable, and goal-oriented you are.
traitDescriptions.emotionalStability: How calm and resilient you are under stress.
traitDescriptions.openness: How curious, creative, and open to new experiences you are.

questionnaire.question: Question {current} of {total}
questionnaire.selectOption: Choose the option that best describes you

results.title: Your Personality Profile
results.subtitle: Based on the Big Five personality model
results.summaryText: Your strongest traits are {trait1} and {trait2}. This suggests that you particularly value these aspects in your daily life and interactions.
results.disclaimer: Personality traits exist on a spectrum and can change over time. This assessment provides a snapshot of your current tendencies, not a fixed definition of who you are.
results.generatingTime: This may take up to a minute
results.noInterpretationsDescription: Click the button above to generate personalized interpretations for your results.

questions.1: I am the life of the party.
questions.2: I have little interest in others.
questions.9: I am relaxed most of the time.
questions.10: I have difficulty understanding abstract ideas.
questions.18: I make a mess of things.
questions.20: I am not interested in abstract ideas.
questions.22: I am not interested in other people's problems.
questions.23: I get chores done right away.
questions.28: I often forget to put things back in their proper place.
questions.30: I do not have a good imagination.
questions.31: I talk to a lot of different people at parties.
questions.32: I am not really interested in others.
questions.34: I change my mood a lot.
questions.35: I am quick to understand things.
questions.36: I don't like to draw attention to myself.
questions.37: I take time out for others.
questions.41: I don't mind being the center of attention.
questions.45: I spend time reflecting on things.
questions.47: I make people feel at ease.
questions.48: I am exacting in my work.
